name: Addiction Destruction Simulator
description:
Some say it's strange, some say it's a tic-saster, I say it's a praise to my Creator, God.

Controls: Z,X, arrow buttons, and maybe even a mouse. Do note, however, as you have the mouse hovering over the screen, it will produce a terrible sound.

What started as a one-room game (Adam CYounis gamejam) evolved into a second game. This was completely different from the original, except the main character sprites which remain.

The characters are original, (not inspired, pfft!) and I totally didn't look for ways around scrolling with success, heh. Also, some of the code I had to snoop about taking bits and pieces, if that's fair.
